name: 咲耶
text:
──ああ
先日はお世話になりました
trans:
──Oh, yes.
Thank you for your help the other day.

name: アシスタント
text:
え……！？
あ、わ、こちらこそお世話になりました！
trans:
Eh...!?
Oh, no, thank you!

name: アシスタント
text:
……白瀬さん、私のこと
覚えててくださったんです……！？
trans: ...Shirase-san, you remember me...!?

name: 咲耶
text: ？　ええ
trans:
?
Yes, of course.

name: 咲耶
text: この間、控室まで案内してくださった方ですよね
trans:
You were the one who showed me the way to the
green room.

name: 咲耶
text:
ご挨拶いただいた時の笑顔が眩しくて──
私も見習いたいなと思ったんです
trans:
Your smile when you greeted me was so bright──
I felt that I had a lot to learn from you.

name: アシスタント
text:
えええ、そんなそんな……！！
白瀬さんの足元にも及びませんから……！！
trans:
Ehhh, there's no way you could...!
I could never compare to you, Shirase-san...!!

name: 咲耶
text:
……悲しいな
そんなふうに言わないでください
trans:
...That hurts my heart to hear.
Please don't talk about yourself that way.

name: 咲耶
text: アナタはとても素敵なんですから
trans: After all, you're so very lovely.

name: アシスタント
text: し、白瀬さん……！！
trans: S-Shirase-san...!!

name: スタッフ
text:
あ～……もう……
バラバラ……
trans:
Ah～...Geez...
My papers fell everywhere...

name: 咲耶
text:
大丈夫ですか？
こっちの方、拾いますね
trans:
Are you alright?
I'll gather up the ones that fell over here.

name: スタッフ
text:
あああ……！
すみません、すみませんっ……！
trans:
Oh, thanks...!
I'm so sorry, pardon me...!

name: 咲耶
text: いえ
trans: There's no need.

name: 咲耶
text: ──はい、どうぞ
trans: ──Here you are.

name: スタッフ
text: ありがとうございます……！
trans: Thank you very much...!

name: 咲耶
text:
いいんです
────ああ、でも
trans:
No need to thank me.
────Oh, although.

name: 咲耶
text: 気を付けてくださいね
trans: Please do try to be more careful.

name: 咲耶
text:
資料は拾えば済むけれど──
アナタが怪我をしてしまったら大変ですから
trans:
Documents can always be picked up and put back
together, but if you yourself were injured, it would
be a terrible thing.

name: スタッフ
trans:
!
Y-yes, of course...!

name: スタイリスト
text:
今日３人の現場だって聞いて
張り切って来たの～！
trans:
Ever since I heard I'd be getting to style the three of
you for today's shoot I've been so excited～!

name: スタイリスト
text: 楽しみで眠れなかったぐらい！
trans:
I was looking forward to it so much I could hardly
sleep last night!

name: 結華
text: わ、ほんとですか！
trans: Wow, really!?

name: 咲耶
text:
嬉しいな
ありがとうございます
trans:
That's such a  nice thing to hear.
Thank you very much.

name: ヘアメイクスタッフ
text:
気持ちわかる～
素材がいいとテンション上がるよね～
trans:
I know what you mean～
When you've get to work with such lovely faces, it
really hypes you up.

name: ヘアメイクスタッフ
text:
とびっきり美しく仕上げるから覚悟してて！
……って言ってもみんなはそもそも綺麗なんだけど！
trans:
Watch out, I'm going to make you all look so good no
one will know what hit them! ...Though, you're all
already so beautiful to begin with!

name: 咲耶
text: そんな
trans: That's not true at all.

name: 咲耶
text:
私たちを輝かせてくださるのは
いつだってみなさんですよ
trans: The ones who are always making us shine, are all of you.

name: 咲耶
text: みなさんあってこその私たちです
trans: It's all thanks to you that we're able to look our best.

name: スタイリスト
text: ねぇちょっと聞いたー！？
trans: Hey, you hear that!?

name: ヘアメイクスタッフ
text:
聞いた……！！
はーっ、やりがいしかない……！
trans:
I sure did...!
Whew, the perks that come with this job...!

name: 摩美々
text: これだから咲耶はさぁ……
trans: Sakuya just doesn't quit, huh...

name: 結華
text: ねー
trans: I know, right.

name: 咲耶
text:
ええ？
なんの話かな？
trans:
Hmmm?
What ever could you mean?

name: 結華
text:
ほらー
そういうとこだぞー
trans:
Oh, you know.
That thing you do.

name: 結華
text: さくやん、みんなの憧れのダーリンが過ぎるって話
trans:
How you go out of your way to be everyone's ideal
darling, Sakuyan.

name: 咲耶
text: それは──……光栄だね？
trans:
That is──
...A compliment, isn't it?

name: 結華
text: そうだけど、そうじゃない～！
trans: Like yeah? But also kinda no～!

name: 摩美々
text:
……まぁ
ハマり役はハマり役だケドねー
trans:
...Well.
You can't deny that she's perfect the role, I guess.

name: 進行管理
text:
ありがとうございます！
以上で、みなさんでの撮影は終了です！
trans:
Thank you very much!
That concludes the group shoot!

name: 進行管理
text:
この後は、順番にソロで撮らせていただきます
休憩後、まずは三峰さんから──
trans:
Next, each of you will do a solo shoot, one at a time.
After your break, you'll be up first, Mitsumine-san.

name: 結華
text: はーいっ
trans: Okay!

name: 咲耶
text: 頑張ってね、結華
trans: Best of luck, Yuika.

name: 摩美々
text:
巻きでよろしくー
後ろ詰まってるからねー
trans:
Make it snappy, okay?
We can't do our solo shoots until you finish yours,
you know.

name: 結華
text:
おっけおっけ
なる早でまみみんに繋げますよー
trans:
Gotcha, gotcha! I'll try to finish and pass it on over
to you ASAP, Mamimin.

name: 摩美々
text: 私の帰宅時間は三峰にかかってるからぁ
trans:
You better.
Especially since you're already keeping me from going
straight home, Mitsumine.

name: 結華
text: ちょいちょい、圧！
trans: Geez! Enough already!

name: 摩美々
text: ふふー
trans: Fufu...

name: 咲耶
text: ──フフ
trans: ──Hehe.
